text: Who ever used blog template which has category for divide blogs into them.
just curious, those who have submitted to the marketplace, *are you guys able to push updates to your templates to people who purchased your template?*

I ask because I’m about to modify the truck out of the HubSpot Stratus template for a client and I don’t want to break HubSpot’s ability to update the template through whatever channel the marketplace may have
we actually talked with HubSpot about this a few weeks ago (so maybe it's changed) but when you update a module, the udpate isn't pushed and needs to be re-downloaded by the user

Interesting. Wonder how this could be improved. Itd be nice if it worked like a wordpress child theme. Youd have a marketplace version thats unchangeable by end user, if they want to change they creat like a child version that only substitute s the parts they need to change then when an update happens it shows under the notification panel(with ability to mute these notifications) then you can hit a button and it would like stage update to the new version and youd get a chance to test a page using the template or module with your child theme before pushing the update live
